name: Russian Lostbelt
startIntroPart1: Great Ivan the Terrible, when the world was destroyed by the Great Ice Age, you used your wits and led the magicians to convert your people into Yaga, so as to escape the extreme winter, and when other civilizations gradually disappeared into the blizzard, only Russia remained.
startIntroPart2: Great Tsar,Almighty Supreme Authority in your hands, can you spread the glory of Russia from Siberia to the whole world?
declaringWar: My march will continue for eternity.God's beast crushes all underfoot.
introduction: Where you're from and how you escaped the blizzard.
uniques: Enemy [Land] units must spend [1] extra movement points when inside your territory

name: Scandinavian Lostbelt
startIntroPart1: The Norse goddess of winter.At the end of Götterdämmerung, Odin has integrated the goddess of Celts into your body, entrusting you with the last spark of the Nine Realms, so that you and the last humans can escape the destruction of Surtr.Under the rule of your superb Rune magic, the last Garden of Eden has been spared from the infestations of giants.
startIntroPart2: The black sun is waking up, the unfinished Götterdämmerung will continue.Can you lead your people across the burning land of ice?
declaringWar: Lower your head. Kneel before a god!
attacked: I will allow it. You will end here...
defeated: Is there someone...anyone...who will help me...?
introduction: I am Scáthach-Skadi. I am a god...no, a kind of Divine Spirit, now. Normally, I would not become a Servant as a Heroic Spirit fighting for humanity.
tradeRequest: I suggest you think about it.
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Chinese Lostbelt
startIntroPart1: Immortal Emperor, you have unified the world with your unparalleled wisdom and coercion.The heroes of Chinese history are all sealed in your treasury, and the warriors of the Qin Empire are unrivaled everywhere they go. The Great Wall towering in low-Earth orbit threatens enemies from the universe.Your people sing and honor you.
startIntroPart2: Great Qin Shi Huang, as Zhenren, can you continue the eternal Qin Empire and continue this utopia that was fought by Chinese soldiers with flesh and blood?
declaringWar: As a new law, we declare: humans shall exist at the threshold of heaven and earth!
attacked: Who do you think we are...fool!
introduction: The conqueror who transcended the Three Sovereigns and exceeded the Five Emperors...that is who Qin Shi Huang is. In other words...that is us!
tradeRequest: This shall be bestowed upon you.

name: Indian Lostbelt
startIntroPart1: Son of Indra, you and your brother have created splendid legends – however, after Kurukshetra War, your mind begins to shift. To destroy evil, you absorb all the Indian gods and create a world of constant reincarnation.All evil will be wiped out again and again in reincarnation.
startIntroPart2: The Final Dark God.It's just a little short of achieving your goal.Will you be able to cut off all evil and complete the final reincarnation?
declaringWar: Saṃsāra of Genesis and Terminus.Give life to those who are good, judge those who are evil.Activate, sword of recursion, so they may perish.
defeated: So I am to meet my end here too... This is also...destiny...
introduction: Arjuna...My existence is to destroy evil...And all evils shall be judged...
neutralHello: The planet shall diminish, and evil will be judged by the sword...
tradeRequest: There is no need to feel lost...

name: Greek Lostbelt
startIntroPart1: King of the Gods, with the will of your home planet, you and the Olympian gods have come to this blue planet. You ruled the mythological era with the supreme lightning, gathering the power of the twelve gods to defeat the white giant and eliminate the opposing gods. Under your rule, the mythological era has flourished to this day.
startIntroPart2: Thunder across the universe, can you maintain your rule and fulfill the will of your home planet in the face of new variables?
declaringWar: I will use my omnipotence to incinerate it all!
defeated: Absurd! To wound my omnipotent self... Just who are you!?
introduction: I am Zeus! I am the omnipotent god who controls all creation from the heavens!
uniques: [+15]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with less Cities than you>

name: British Lostbelt
startIntroPart1: Winter Queen, the witch who rules over the fairy kingdom. You rule over the entire Britain with terror, maintaining this fragile and sinful land. The era of humanity has come to an end, and Britain is a paradise exclusively for fairies. With the help of fairy knights, no one dares to resist your rule.
startIntroPart2: The gods who were brutally killed will return, and the hollow insects will envelop the sky over Britain. The calamity of the fairies has already arrived - it is time to repay their sins. Can you protect this kingdom and your hopes?
declaringWar: ...Let all within my sight burn to ash.
attacked: Good... Very good.Beg for forgiveness at my feet.
defeated: Unbelievable. In my shame, I nearly forgot myself...
introduction: I am the queen of Faerie Britain, who still curses Proper Human History.
tradeRequest: Don't dwell on things too much. It's more fun that way.

name: Mictlan Lostbelt
startIntroPart1: The supreme god of Maya, you came to this planet 66 million years ago to transform the environment and provide an underground world for the ravaged life. However, this time you did not choose humans, but chose the more powerful Dinosaur, as the sun and UO protecting the nine layered world.
startIntroPart2: The sun is about to go out.The giant spider that devoured the planet will wake up again. Great Kukulkan, can you reignite the sun this time?
declaringWar: It seems it's not enough yet. Turn to microscopic dust!
attacked: Fine. We'll understand each other by means of death… is what you're saying?
defeated: Since I have a vessel, it's a self-explanatory logic that I can break. It's a shame.
introduction: I'm Kukulkan.I'm the guardian of the water, wind, and land of the sea of trees.
neutralHello: I'll use this as a reference.
uniques: [+30]% Strength <for [{Military} {Land}] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles> <when below [40] HP>]
Empire enters a [8]-turn Golden Age <when wonders are built in capital>
